pageContext.title: Text Scroller
pageContext.miniDescription: Blazing fast, smooth scrolling text section, 50+ customization options.
pageContext.description:
The Text Scroller section is a copy/paste code that adds a marquee section to your theme.

Effectively drive attention to your offers in seconds. 50+ customization options to match any design!


No apps.
Compatible with all themes. (paid, free or custom made.)
Loads faster than any app.
Coded by certified Shopify Experts, no freelancers.

→ Live Demo ←


What you'll get:


At the customize page you'll be able to change options to your liking, such as:


- Font sizes (individual values for desktop & mobile)



- Text scrolling speed (individual values for desktop & mobile). How slow or how fast the text scrolls through


- Text gradient. Make gorgeous and unique designs with your very gradient colors



- Text border. Add a border around your text, with opacity and color control.



- Link. Make your text scroller section clickable, redirect to any URL.



- Pause on hover



- Space between items. Customize the space between each item in your section. (individual values for desktop & mobile)



- Section's top/bottom padding. (individual values for desktop & mobile)


- Section's top and bottom space. (individual values for desktop & mobile)


- Direction. Both "left to right" and "right to left" are available.




- Inclination: tilt your section diagonally. (individual values for desktop & mobile)


- Section's width control


- Add images


- Or, alternatively to images, add your icon's SVG code. You can also control its size.


- Modify elements individually. You are able to change the font size, color, etc of any of the individual items to create unique styles.


- Blazing fast! Our code does not impact your website's speed.

- Unique optimization with Javascript for butter smooth animations.

Installation:

Installation takes 1 minute:


Support:

We give 100% support to all of its users to ensure that what you're seeing on the demo page is exactly what you see on your website, same day responses are guaranteed.
